name: The Priest
description:
!! We recommend turning off the music for the best experience !!

How To Play:

Controls: W, A, S, D or ARROWS to move

Pray: E

Drop plant: Q

Open spell book: TAB

Lore:

The demon was sent by Satan to Earth. As a priest, it is your duty to destroy him. Explore the world in search of plants. Drop them on the ritual altar to cast spells. Follow the recipe exactly, or the spell will not work.  As soon as all the plants are in, pray to God( Make sure you are in the ritual circle too ). The spell will begin to work if everything has been done correctly.
